data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lü, Dongbiao, Yan, Yanhua, Li, Weihai, Wang, Hongliang (2019): A new species of the genus Chinoperla (Plecoptera: Perlidae) from southern China. Zootaxa 4614 (1): 187-190, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4614.1.10|3 occurrences
